text: Eric Agyemang (born 11 January 1980 in Obuasi) is a German footballer. He currently plays for Arminia Bielefeld. ==Career== On 10 April 2010, Agyemang scored his first hat-trick in Germany for Erzgebirge Aue against VfL Osnabrück. ==Personal life== He was born in Obuasi, Ghana. ==References== == External links == * Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:Ghanaian footballers Category:FC St. Pauli players Category:People from Obuasi Category:1. title: Eric Agyemang
